name: Fetch customer alerts using CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930008499000"
When I fetch the alerts for CIF Key: "0100000930008499000"

Then the following alerts should be returned
| customerStatus | customerCreditGrade | complaintsAndErrors | complaintsAndErrorsString | potentialMerge | marpFlag | personalInsolvencyIndicator | ctsFlag | riskFlag | smeFinancialDifficultyFlag | cjaCompliant | cjaCode |
| UNKNOWN |  | true | Customer has an open complaint | false | false | false | false | Standard | false | false |  |

children.description: Validate response: | customerStatus | customerCreditGrade | complaintsAndErrors | complaintsAndErrorsString | potentialMerge | marpFlag | personalInsolvencyIndicator | ctsFlag | riskFlag | smeFinancialDifficultyFlag | cjaCompliant | cjaCode | | UNKNOWN | | true | Customer has an open complaint | false | false | false | false | Standard | false | false | |

userStory.storyName: Fetch the alerts for a customer

title: Fetch customer alerts using CIF Key
